evidence.text: March 11, 2025, the administration announced a Reduction in Force (“RIF”) of nearly fifty percent of the Department’s workforce. Due to the RIF and other actions by the Department, approximately 90% of IES’s staff was eliminated, shrinking IES to approximately twenty employees, and NCES—one of the nation’s oldest statistical centers—has shrunk from approximately 100 employees down to three.
